rules_text:
Casualty of War deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
{2}{R}{R}, Exile Casualty of War from your graveyard: Arm up to two target creatures you control. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {2}, then attach it to that creature.)[/i]
